column2: 仔细检查，详尽讨论：examine carefully or discuss thoroughly；游说，去（一个地区）的各处或找到（个人）来拉选票或订单：solicits votes or orders
投降，默许：give all resistance
一时冲动的决定：impulsive change；反复无常，善变：change, impulsively
吸引：attract
忧心忡忡的，焦虑的：grief, anxiety
主要的，非常重要的：foremost importance, paramount
用讽刺歪曲等手法的夸张，漫画，讽刺画：exaggeration；嘲笑性模仿或夸张：copy, exaggerate
肉体的，物质的：physical；世俗的：worldly
畅饮，狂欢作乐：drink, freely
对小事吹毛求疵，挑剔，表现不满：peevish criticism, objections, express dissatisfaction, tiresomely
雕刻：three-dimensional representation；（通过长期不懈努力）开创，开拓：produce or bring about
演员，演员阵容：a set of characters；选派（演员）：assign, actor；提出：give off；抛弃：get rid of
强烈（公开）指责：criticize；惩罚：penalty
成为···的导火索，导致：be the cause of
大灾难：tragedy；彻底的失败：utter failure
没有例外的，无条件限制的，绝对的：without, qualification, absolute
普遍的，包容的：not limited or specialized
腐蚀性的：destroying, eating away；挖苦讽刺的，刻薄的：incisive sarcasm
警告，告诫：warning of a specific limitation
挑剔，吹毛求疵：quibble
欢快地蹦跳或行走，雀跃：sprightly
（根据条约）放弃，割让：surrender possession of
粘合，粘合剂：uniting, binding
审查并删除不良的东西：examine, delete
挑剔指责的：critical
公开表示反对，谴责：public, formal disapproval
人口普查：survey, population
终止，暂停：stopping of a process
开玩笑：make jokes
沮丧，懊恼：mind
变色龙，善变的人：changes or adopts opinions
支持：support
混乱：disorder, confusion
装模作样：intended to deceive；动作字谜：represented in pantomime
骗子，装懂的人：fraudulent
非常谨慎的：cautious
镂雕（金属）以装饰：decorate；驱赶：force out
分歧，（意见、利益或忠诚上）明显差异：pronounced difference
盲目爱国的：excessive favoritism
使突然停止，阻止：arrest, abruptly；同意，一致：agreement
天使般可爱的：rosy
诡计多端的，欺骗：deception
责备：scold mildly
易怒的，暴躁的：angered；生气的：anger, irate
与···和谐一致，符合：accord, agree
彩色的：colors
经常发生的，复发的：frequent recurrence；习惯性的，不可能改变的：not likely, change
粗野的人：rude, boorish；吝啬鬼：mean, stingy
无影响或无价值的人：no importance, influence；计算（价值）：determine, mathematical operations；密码：conceal
迂回的，不直接的：not, forthright, direct；冗长的：more, necessary
绕圈子说话：unnecessarily, indirect, evasion；冗长：too many
限制：limit；包围，围绕：surround
谨慎的，小心的：careful
躲避，不遵从：avoid, comply
彬彬有礼：courteous, politeness
要求（权利）：ask for, right；断言：state as a fact；剥夺生命：deprive, life；权利：right
隐藏的，秘密的：secret, illicit, improper
清楚响亮的：loud, clear
清晰，清楚：clear, lucidity；清澈透明：easily seen through
紧握：holding
宽容的，善良的：tolerant, kind；气候温和的：neither, high, low
陈词滥调（的）：hackneyed
阻碍物：something, movement, progress difficult；阻碍：difficulty；堵塞：prevent, through
密集的一群：a number of things, a unit；堵塞：prevent, through, filling with something；凝结：jelly
突然的一场暴雨：sudden copious rainfall
权力，影响力：influence
甜得发腻的，感情用事的：sweet, sentimental
笨拙的：lacking, nimbleness, lack, skill；不文雅的：lacking, grace, inability, graceful；不精致的：roughly
（使）凝结，（使）变稠：coherent, clot
合并，融合：whole, fuse
哄骗：pleading, flattery, cajole
终曲：concluding passage
（以武力）强制：force, threat
同时代的，同龄的：equal age
令人信服的：convincing；相关的：pertinent
知道的，意识到的：aware
突然倒塌或收缩：fall, shrink；完全耗尽体力：depletion, energy, strength；失败：unsuccessful
串通，共谋（做坏事）：together secretly, fraudulent, deceitful, conspire
巨大的：size, degree, immense
不守纪律的：not subjected, discipline；爱开玩笑的：joking, teasing
昏迷，深度无知觉：profound unconsciousness；迟钝，冷漠：sluggishness
可燃的：igniting；容易激动的：easily excited
漂亮的，吸引人的：pleasing, wholesome, attractive
友好，社会和谐：friendly, harmony
开始：beginning；毕业典礼：conferring
赞扬：approbation, praise；委托保管：entrust；推荐：recommend
同样大小的：equal；相称的，相当的：proportionate
充分混合：blend
致力，投入：obligated, impelled；确信：belief；承诺，表态：revealing one’s view
忠诚的，忠实的：loyal
宽敞舒适的：spacious
符合常识的，有依据的：common sense, sound
骚乱：disturbance
摘要：summary, abstract；目录，各种各样的列表或集合：list, collection
自满，无忧患意识：self-satisfaction, unawareness of trouble
愿意顺从，讨好，彬彬有礼：comply, affability
顺从的：submissive
称赞，恭维：praise；敬意，免费赠送的礼物：respectful
遵从：conform, submit
使镇定：calm；组成，构成：form, constitute
